title: The Black Heart Curse
description: For fans of Stephen King's Carrie, paranormal romance, horror and erotica. Amy I have spent my whole life being followed by a curse. It’s a curse that gives me a supernatural power. I’d like to think of it as magic. The word makes it sounds so innocent, so fairy tale like, the dream of a million children worldwide. But there is nothing innocent about being able to cause death ...
author: Tiffany Fox
